sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import AddFormat from './AddForms' import { useState } from 'react' const Employes = ({item ,index, handelDelet}) => { const handelDelet1 = (index) => { handelDelet(index) } const [show , setShow] = useState(false) const handelShow = ()=> setShow(true); const handelClose = ()=> setShow(false); return ( <> {item.name} {item.email} {item.address} {item.phone} {/* اظهار قائمة اضافة موظف جديد */} Edite Employee ) } export default Employes;
